setting.name: *serv_status_cmd
setting.desc: Sets name of command which dispays servers status. Leave empty to disable the command.

setting.name: *display_player_names
setting.desc: Set to true to display player names in server status.

setting.name: *serv_status_int
setting.desc: Set to 0 to disable automatic servers status message. Otherwise set number of seconds between such messages.

setting.name: *global_cmd
setting.desc: Sets name of command for global chat, which is bradcast messages to all servers. Leave empty to disable the command.

setting.name: *join_quit
setting.desc: Set to true if you want messages about players joining and quiting servers.
